properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 2:20PM MST until January 13 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Periods of heavy snow with lulls of much lighter snow or
no snow at all. Snowfall rates will also vary through the
period. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 15 inches with locally
higher amounts expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains.

* WHEN...From 12 PM Saturday to 9 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult especially over Rabbit Ears
Pass. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be
obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 9 AM MST MONDAY
